Links

There are plenty of interesting pages about calendaring.

Here you will find a collection of some, we like and think are useful to you too:

funny ways to look at Calendaring

  • Your Calendrical Fallacy Is… by Dave Delong
  • Falsehoods programmers believe about time and More falsehoods programmers believe about time; “wisdom of the crowd” edition by Noah Sussman
  • The evolution a developer’s understanding of time by Stephen Bonns
